Description:
Detects tampering of RDP Terminal Service/Server sensitive settings.
Such as allowing unauthorized users access to a system via the 'fAllowUnsolicited' or enabling RDP via 'fDenyTSConnections', etc.


Author: Samir Bousseaden, David ANDRE, Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g, Nasreddine Bencherchali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: RDP Sensitive Settings Changed to Zero
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\fdenytsconnections' or target_object like '%\fsinglesessionperuser' or target_object like '%\userauthentication') and details = 'dword (0x00000000)'
